title: When is The Walking Dead season 10 UK air date and time?
text:
The Walking Dead is back for its tenth season with some familiar faces and a few new ones (Picture: AMC)

The Walking Dead is showing no signs of dying as it stumbles back to screens for its 10th series, which kicked off in the US last night.

And the first episode of the new season suggests it’s got off to a cracking start, with metro.co.uk saying the instalment ‘lays emotional and explosive groundwork’ for the rest of the series.

We can’t wait to see it here, and the good news is we don’t have to hang on for long – but when does the series start in the UK and how can you watch?

Here’s what you need to know…

When is The Walking Dead season 10 UK air date and time?

The new series of The Walking Dead kicks off on Fox in the UK on Monday night at 9pm.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

It’ll be followed immediately afterwards by spin-off show Talking Dead at 10.05pm, which sees Chris Hardwick discuss the events of the episode with fans, producers and other guests.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The series will continue on Monday nights on Fox at the same time, with Talking Dead continuing to air afterwards.

If you miss any episodes you can catch up with them on Sky catchup or via NOW TV.

How many episodes are in the new series of The Walking Dead?

Thora Birch is new to the cast as Gamma (Picture: AMC)

There are eight episodes in the new season of the show.

Episode one is entitled Lines We Cross, and we’ve already had a look at episode two, We Are The End Of The World.

The remaining episode titles are as follows:

Ghosts

Silence The Whisperers

What It Always Is

Bonds

Open Your Eyes

The World Before

Who is new to the cast of The Walking Dead season 10?

We’ll be bidding farewell to Michonne this season(Picture: Fox)

The new series introduces us to Thora Birch as Gamma, a new members of the Whisperers, and Paola Lazaro as key character Princess – as well as Kevin Carroll who’ll be playing the role of Virgil, a man trying to get home to his family.

In terms of the cast regulars, it’s the last season for Danai Gurira as Michonne, with the actress confirming her exit from the show in February.
description: The Walking Dead is back on our screens for its tenth season - here's how you can watch it in the UK.
